babble.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to speak quickly in a way that is difficult to understand or sounds silly
babble.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: I have no idea what he was babbling on about.
babble.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to make a sound like water moving over stones
babble.translation[1].definitions[0].def: the confused sound of many people talking at the same time
babble.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: the babble of a crowded party
babble.translation[1].definitions[1].def: a sound like water moving over stones
